alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 1:41AM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL PLAINS, NORTHEAST AND CENTRAL HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITIES AND ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... .Southwest to west winds strengthen Sunday with humidities lowering to less than 15 percent while temperatures will be about 10 degrees warmer than normal. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Fire Weather Watch...which is in effect from Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * AREA AND TIMING...Northeast Plains (Zone 104), Northeast Highlands (Zone 123), Central Highlands (Zone 125) and the East Central Plains (Zone 126) from late Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest to west 20 to 35 mph with gusts to around 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from around 8 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
